messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: Hello, daddy's princesses. Your daddy's here. I have a pinpointer, so I know where all of you are. I have my own army to stop you from doing whatever you are doing. Good luck.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: There are three gods. With their three great nations. Securitania. Has the god ''Gimmesumsuccpls.'' Cargonia, has the god ''Wolxy.'' And there remains another god. Triton, The god of The Researchonian Empire. The empire that all other nation's depend on. Shall you be a nation of war. Or bringers of a new age of peace...Only time will tell. Go forth. And build a new eden.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The Researchonian Empire is under rule of Command. All other Nations should elect their leaders and report to the Bridge to discuss terms of territory and trade.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: WE DO NOT WANT TO TRADE. STEP DOWN. SECURITITANIA IS THE GREATEST NATION. JOIN SECURITITANIA TO GET GEAR AND BE IN THE GREATEST ARMY. ALL OTHERS WILL MINE IN LAVALAND.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: CARGO IS HALF DESTROYED NOW. SURRENDER OR YOU WILL BE KILLED.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: CARGONIA WILL FALL. ALL ATTACK CARGONIA. HAIL ZERO. ANY UNLOYAL PERSONELL WILL BE TERMINATED.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to bad luck, a pack of [REDACTED] have swarmed into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to High Capital of Dunwall.. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in High Capital of Dunwall.'s powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to High Capital of Dunwall.. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Bye y'all, come again now, ye hear?
